summary: bug fixes for the mod Belua Sanguinare Revisited.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Updated v1.1[/b] : fix for the configuration power. Now allow to configure the trespass weakness properly through the vorace adjucator power (was previously changing the sun weakness). If you're updating from v1.0, you just need to replace the esp.

Anyone who played with the Belua Sanguinare mod for Skyrim came across some bugs that can seriously hinder the experience. This small mod aim to fix some of the more obvious and annoying bugs, starting with the infamous "drain sickness" bug.

Just copy the fix in your Data folder, replace the files and play. As the changes are minimal, this won't affect your saved game in any fashion.

Simply put, I edited the script responsible for feeding to remove the part that was causing the status on any npc having the condition for it. As a result, you'll now be able to feed on any and all npcs in Skyrim, including those from the dlcs. And yes, this include Dragonborn.

Warning : this is not a standalone. You need to install the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17077]Belua Sanguinare mod[/url] first.

/!Disclaimer/! : I am not the Belua Sanguinare Overhaul's author nor part of their team. Simply, as the mod seems to be no longer looked after with that annoying bug still around, I took the liberty to fix it and share it with others. All credits for the mod itself goes to its author.
author: Chantelune
